text: wlw annahm eamiluu bima fi altawrat wal'injyl, wabima 'unzil ealayk 'ayuha alrasul - wahu alquran alkarim - lruziqu min kll sbylin, fa'anzalna ealayhim almtr, wa'anbatna lahum althmr, whdha jaza'an aldnya. w'inn min 'ahl alkitab fryqana metdla thabtana ealaa alhq, wakathir minhum sa' emluh, wadala ean sawa' alsbyl
